title: The Sentient Collector
description: Book Description  An exciting story of insurmountable odds and overwhelmingly capable enemies. This is the 2nd novel from the author of TRANSITORY.  Readers said that TRANSITORY was:  “A must-read for lovers of science fiction.”  “Clever, complex science fiction.”  “His characterisations were brilliant. They made me care about Nate.”  “An Excellent Debut Sci-Fi Novel.”  From the Back Cover  In 2058 everything and everyone is connected. THEY ARE VULNERABLE.  An EVIL intelligence lurks deep within the SIMOVA network, waiting for its time to strike. Only a few know it even exists. They will not risk others knowing.  Once it begins, it cannot be stopped. Only one man can try. He is called THE SENTIENT COLLECTOR. Unfortunately, most think he is but a myth. Proving he is not could make the difference between war and peace.  Thrust into action, GRAHAM DENEHEY must find this mysterious figure before it is too late.  THE SENTIENT COLLECTOR is the first book in THE SENTIENT TRILOGY.
author: Ian   Williams
